a.detail:
Earthmaw Trap: DC 15 to find, DC 15 to disable;
    +8 to hit against one target, 2d10 piercing damage

details.floor: Natural Stone (difficult terrain, disadvantage on acrobatics) (Slippery Foor)
details.history: The dungeon was created by yuan-ti as a stronghold. It was eventually conquered by invaders, and has fallen to ruin and been rebuilt many times since then.
details.illumination: Average (shadowy in corridors, lamps or torches in most rooms)

monster: 2 x Goblin (cr 1/4, mm 166) and 4 x Giant Rat (cr 1/8, mm 327); deadly, 200 xp

Treasure: 1700 cp, 1300 sp, 60 gp, diamond (50 gp), chalcedony (50 gp), 2 x moonstone (50 gp), star rose quartz (50 gp), zircon (50 gp), Potion of Greater Healing (uncommon, dmg 187), Potion of Growth (uncommon, dmg 187)
detail.room_features: A mural of arcane patterns covers the ceiling, and a stream of oil flows into the room through a hole in the ceiling
trap:
Teleporter Crystal: DC 15 to find, DC 15 to disable;
    affects each creature which touches the crystal, DC 10 save or be teleported to another location

contents.inhabited: 2 x Goblin and 4 x Giant Rat
contents.summary: 2 x Goblin and 4 x Giant Rat, Teleporter Crystal

south.desc: Locked Iron Door (DC 15 to open, DC 30 to break; 60 hp)

west.desc: Locked Good Wooden Door (DC 15 to open, DC 15 to break; 15 hp)

detail.room_features: An iron chandelier hangs from the ceiling in the north-west corner of the room, and a rusted iron box lies in the east side of the room

west.desc: Stuck Good Wooden Door (DC 15 to break; 15 hp)

settings.name: The Sanctum of the Lich Princess

wandering_monsters.1: Orog (cr 2, mm 247); deadly, 450 xp, tracking the party
wandering_monsters.2: 2 x Hobgoblin (cr 1/2, mm 186); hard, 200 xp, gathered around an evil shrine
wandering_monsters.3: Silver Dragon Wyrmling (cr 2, mm 118); deadly, 450 xp, wielding bizarre eldritch powers
wandering_monsters.4: Silver Dragon Wyrmling (cr 2, mm 118); deadly, 450 xp, bloodied and fleeing a more powerful enemy
wandering_monsters.5: Orc (cr 1/2, mm 246) and 1 x Half-ogre (cr 1, mm 238); deadly, 300 xp, tracking the party
wandering_monsters.6: 2 x Goblin (cr 1/4, mm 166); easy, 100 xp, scouting from another part of the dungeon
